native static int, int, int, int '''GetViewWindow'''()
== Usage == Used to get the offsets of the view port alongside the dimensions of it. This does not return the real width or height of the screen. [[GetWidth]] and [[GetHeight]] should be used if getting the screen dimensions is desired.
=== Return value === Returns four values in this order: *The real pixel x offset of the view port *The real pixel y offset of the view port *The real pixel width of the view port *The real pixel height of the view port
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
